channel.title: Error! Please Help Me!
channel.description:
I posted my Server Online Yesterday, I have this error and Cant play, Nobody can !! Please Help!
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/4q3eaw.jpg[/img]

item.title: Error! Please Help Me!
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:


I have no idea what the 2's are after the shop name but I am assuming you set it up right. Try that now.

I have no idea what the 2’s are after the shop name but I am assuming you set it up right. Try that now.

Read full topic

item.title: Error! Please Help Me!
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Always back up your server just in case of issues like this too.

Edit hang on I can’t use tab while I’m posting a reply so sec

The other guys mentioned the fix, though. Remove the spaces and instead use tabs.

Read full topic

item.title: Error! Please Help Me!
item.dc:creator: @Viz_Curse Viz Curse
item.description:
@Viz_Curse wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:8, topic:444835”]Firstly you dont need to compile when you editing a cfg file.
Secondly as all the others stated use tabs instead of spaces, if that doesn’t work make sure your following the format of the file exactly so if for example the format was:

shop = ID NPCID ITEM AMOUNT shop = 1 3 777 10 //this is right shopp= e 4 g 6 // This is wrong

Obviously if I put that into a propper file I would use tabs…[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Error! Please Help Me!
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Firstly you dont need to compile when you editing a cfg file.
Secondly as all the others stated use tabs instead of spaces, if that doesn’t work make sure your following the format of the file exactly so if for example the format was:

shop = ID NPCID ITEM AMOUNT shop = 1 3 777 10 //this is right shopp= e 4 g 6 // This is wrong

Obviously if I put that into a propper file I would use tabs…

Read full topic

Lol yup, it will work if you fix what I told you to. And you don’t need to compile.

item.title: Error! Please Help Me!
item.dc:creator: @Viz_Curse Viz Curse
item.description:
@Viz_Curse wrote:

Nope didn’t work, I commented everything I recently did to te shops out, It still has same error. I did compiler to.
Guess I broke server and bought VPS for no reason .-.

item.title: Error! Please Help Me!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Viz Curse, post:4, topic:444835”][quote author=marcbob link=topic=547518.msg4014530#msg4014530 date=1339514929]
Were you editing your shops recently? It looks as though you messed up the shops which is preventing the server to run. It’s happened to me before too but I remember the spots I was editing so I can go back and see the error.

Just make sure every item id in the shop has an amount of them after it.
[/quote]

Okay one minute, I’ll comment everything I did out,[/quote]

Jc22493:

Use tabs instead of spaces when you’re editing a .cfg file.

Read full topic

item.title: Error! Please Help Me!
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Were you editing your shops recently? It looks as though you messed up the shops which is preventing the server to run. It’s happened to me before too but I remember the spots I was editing so I can go back and see the error.

Just make sure every item id in the shop has an amount of them after it.
